College_Name: IIT Delhi (IITD)
College_Summary: IIT Delhi is India’s top Engineering and Research institution. IIT Delhi was established in 1961 and has a sprawling green campus of 320 Acres in Hauz Khas region of New Delhi, the National capital of India. The institute has 2 other satellite campuses located in Sonipat and Jhajjar. The international campus of IIT Delhi is located in Abu Dhabi. Globally, QS World University Ranking 2024 ranks IIT Delhi on 197. NIRF 2023 ranking of IIT Delhi stands at 2nd in the Engineering category. Also, the college ranks on top, i.e. #1 in India Today Engineering Ranking 2023.

The institute has bagged 7th position in India‘s Best B-Schools by Business Today for the year 2023. MDI Gurgaon offers PGDM as its flagship programme in the offline and online modes. The institute also offers Executive PG courses, Fellowship programmes and Management Development programmes.

College_Name: SRM University Sonepat
College_Summary:
SRM University, Delhi NCR Sonepat, Haryana is a full-fledged University established by the Haryana State Government under the Private Universities Act, 2006 with all the privileges and pride to exist and expand into a world-class University. SRM Group of Institution is a pioneer with over 5 decades of expertise in education. The Group has 4 Universities & 24 institutions all across India delivering quality education, pioneering research, and
comprehensive student development. The University is approved by the Department of Science and Technology (DST), Govt. of India to conduct ‘INSPIRE’- Internship Science Camp & Regional Innovation Science Hubs for Innovators (RISHI) program and Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (SIRO). SRM University offers degree and doctoral programs in the disciplines of Engineering, Law, Hotel Management, Science, and many more. SRM embraces on experiential learning, a choice-based credit system, and live projects, providing students with practical exposure and a holistic educational experience.

College_Name: AIIMS Delhi
College_Summary: AIIMS Delhi is India’s Best Medical Institute being ranked 1st in India in the Medical Category by NIRF, India Today, Outlook, and IIRF in 2023. Established in 1956 in New Delhi, AIIMS Delhi is recognized as an Institute of National Importance offering UG, PG, and Doctoral courses through 40+ departments across Medicine, Dentistry, Nursing, and Paramedical.  The institute is also ranked 6th in India under the Overall Category by NIRF 2023 and 12th in the University Category by US News 2023. All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Delhi is the first AIIMS in India established under an Act of Parliament 1956. The institute currently operates autonomously under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare.

College_Name: NIFT Delhi
College_Summary: National Institute of Fashion Technology Delhi was established in 1986 and is the top Design Institute among the Design Institutes in India. NIFT is the pioneering institute of fashion education in the country and has been in the vanguard of providing professional human resource to the textile and apparel industry. NIFT Delhi offers 7 UG, 3 PG & Diploma courses. The popular courses offered at NIFT Delhi are B.Des., B.F.Tech, M.Des., M.F.M., and M.F.Tech. Admission to any program at NIFT Delhi is based on the NIFT Entrance exams and GD/PI.

College_Name: JIMS Kalkaji
College_Summary: Jagannath International Management School (JIMS) Kalkaji has 26 years of academic excellence with multiple management & technical colleges in Delhi- NCR. It has been consistently ranked as the top B-School in India by 15+ Business Magazines. All programs offered by the Institute are NBA accredited and have Equivalence to MBA by the Association of Indian University. JIMS Kalkaji is the Only Institute in Delhi to have collaborated with the prestigious Harvard Business School Online, USA. Certification course worth INR 1.2L included in fees. JIMS offers a Postgraduate Diploma in International Business and Management. Admission to these courses is entrance based followed by Group discussion and Personal Interviews.

College_Name: Miranda House, Delhi University
College_Summary: Miranda House is a women's college affiliated with Delhi University. Miranda House has been ranked No. 1 among colleges by NIRF Ranking 2023. It is accredited with a grade A+ (first cycle) & A++ (second cycle) by the NAAC. Miranda House offers several UG and PG courses under different specializations. Along with that, the college also offers foreign language courses and short-duration certificate courses.

College_Name: Hansraj College
College_Summary: Hansraj College is a government college in Delhi. It has been ranked 12th in the ‘Overall’ category according to NIRF ranking 2023. Hansraj College is also accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC and the college is affiliated with Delhi University. Hansraj College offers courses in Liberal Arts and Science and Commerce. Its UG and PG courses include Science, Commerce, and Humanities. Along with that Hansraj College also offers the option for add-on courses such as Anchoring and T.V Journalism, Acting and Filmmaking, etc.

College_Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth Institute of Management and Research - [BVIMR], New Delhi
College_Summary: Bharati Vidyapeeth University Institute of Management and Research (BVIMR) is an 8-acre campus situated in West Delhi having an exceptional infrastructure, lush verdant woods and landscaped gardens, that provide an idyllic environment to engage in Management and IT studies.

College_Name: JNU
College_Summary: Jawahar Lal Nehru University or popularly known as JNU is a world-renowned university for postgraduate and research studies. Established in 1969, JNU is a central university with the status of ‘University of Excellence' by the UGC and NAAC ‘A++’ accreditation. The university is ranked 2nd among the top 100 universities in NIRF Rankings 2023. JNU offers over 100 courses at UG, PG, Diploma, Advanced Diploma, and Doctorate levels through 14 schools, 50+ centres, and eight special centres to more than 9000 students. JNU has also become India’s first-ever University to offer foreign language courses within its Integrated MA program. JNU has signed MoUs with many national and international universities for faculty and student exchange programs.

College_Name: JSB Ghaziabad
College_Summary: Established in 2008, Jaipuria School of Business, Ghaziabad is one of the top PGDM institute in Delhi NCR in Northern India and is the flagship Institute of the Jaipuria Group of Management Institutions. College_Name: Kirori Mal College
College_Summary: Kirori Mal College is an affiliated college of Delhi University. It is accredited by the NAAC with an ‘A++’ grade and ranked 9th in Science category by The Week 2022. Kirori Mal College offers 40 UG and PG courses to 1400 students every year. The college has 20 academic departments, including the Department of History and Department, Mathematics, Department of Computer Science, etc.

College_Name: FIIB Delhi
College_Summary: Established in 1995 with a campus size of 1 acre, Fortune Institute of International Business (FIIB), New Delhi has a 25+ year’s legacy of excellence in management education. The B-School is awarded by Adfocus Media as the Best Institute for Business Recruitment in Delhi NCR The B-School has also been awarded ‘Best Educational Institute for Industry Interface in India’ by ASSOCHAM. The college has a 25+ year’s legacy of excellence in management education, FIIB offers AICTE approved two-year full-time flagship general PGDM programme as well as a 2 year specialized PGDM programme in Financial Management. Apart from PGDM, the institute offers one full-time and one part-time Postgraduate Program in Business Intelligence and Data Analytics (PGP-BI & DA). These programmes are offered in association with IBM Corporation.

College_Name: IMS Ghaziabad University Courses Campus
College_Summary: IMS Ghaziabad (University Courses Campus) was founded in 1990 by a group of visionaries and intellectuals to impart quality education in a stimulating and innovative environment where students are empowered with knowledge and professional skills while upholding the values of integrity, tolerance and mutual respect. IMS, Ghaziabad, University Courses Campus is affiliated by Chaudhary Charan Singh University (CCS), Meerut. It is accredited ‘A Grade’ by NAAC and ISO (9001:2015 & 50001:2018) certified. The college ranked 67th in Top B-School in India and 24th in North Zone by IIRF 2023. College_Name: IASRI
College_Summary: ICAR-Indian Agricultural Statistics Research Institute (IASRI) is a pioneer institute of Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR). Indian Agricultural Statistics Research Institute was established in the year 1970. IASRI holds the approval of UGC and occupies a place of pride in the National Agricultural Statistics System (NASS). College_Name: Delhi University (DU)
College_Summary: University of Delhi, popularly known as Delhi University or DU is a public central university established in 1922. DU is recognised as an “Institute of Excellence” by the UGC and accredited by the NAAC with an ‘A+’ grade. Delhi University is ranked 11 and 22 under the 'University' and 'Overall' categories in NIRF Rankings 2023, respectively. Delhi University has two campuses - North and South. The north campus comprises 16 colleges, while the south campus has 25 colleges. DU offers over 500 full-time courses at UG, PG, PG Diploma, Diploma, Certificate, and Doctoral levels through 91 affiliated colleges, 86 Departments, and 16 faculties. Delhi University also offers distance learning programs from its regular full-time courses through its School of Open Learning (DU SOL). DU also has a Non-Collegiate Women’s Education Board (NCWEB) for female students.

The college has made significant progress in terms of restricting of courses and syllabi, introducing new courses, experimenting with innovative techniques of imparting legal education and strengthening its clinical programme in order to give due emphasis to the expanding horizons of the legal profession. The faculty of law is striving to be an institution of excellence in legal education.

The course curriculum adopted by the institute is latest and matches with the International standards. ISAB is ranked among top 10 ABM institutions in India and received India Agribusiness Award 2022. It is offering a full-time MBA program in food & agribusiness with 9 areas of specialization along with an executive and specialized program in food and agribusiness. Admissions are based on CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ CMAT/ ATMA or ISA’ BEST conducted by the institute. NIT Delhi is a public technical university located in Delhi, India. Established in 2010, NIT Delhi is one of India's thirty-one National Institutes of Technology. NIT Delhi admission to various UG, PG, and doctorate-level programs is based on national-level exams accepted by the institute.

College_Name: Chhotu Ram Rural Institute of Technology (CRRIT)
College_Summary: Chhotu Ram Rural Institute of Technology (CRRIT) is a polytechnic institute, located in Kanjhawala, Delhi. Established in 1985, CRRIT is approved by AICTE and affiliated to BTE, NCT Delhi.  CRRIT offers 8 diploma programs in the field of engineering and architecture to 1750 students. CRRIT admission to all courses is based on the Common Entrance Test (CET) conducted by Delhi Skill and Entrepreneurship University (DSEU), followed by counseling by BTE/DSEU.

College_Name: Gurugram University
College_Summary: Gurugram University is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC). Gurugram University offers 4 undergraduate courses and 8 postgraduate programs. The university provides undergraduate programs in engineering, pharmacy, animation, media, law and healthcare. Gurugram University offers PG degrees with specialization in management, science, the humanities, business administration, commerce, law and the arts. The Gurugram University also offers doctoral programs, integrated programs, certificate programs and postgraduate diplomas. At Gurugram University, admission to the majority of UG and PG programmes is based on merit and passing test scores. For programmes like B.Pharm and M.Pharm, admission is determined by GPAT scores and online counseling (conducted by HSTES), respectively. Check: Gurugram University Admission

College_Name: SunRise University (SRU), Alwar
College_Summary: Sunrise University (SRU) is a Private University, located in Alwar, Rajasthan and was established in the year 2011. The University is approved by The University Grants Commission (UGC) and All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). SRU offers various Polytechnic Diploma, UG, Integrated, PG Diploma, PG, Ph.D., and M.Phil. courses. Admission to all the courses are Merit Bases except Ph.D. and M.Phil., where the applicant needs to appear for the Entrance Test and Personal Interview conducted by SRU.

College_Name: Monad University, Hapur
College_Summary: Monad University, established in 2010, is a private university founded by Monad Education Society. The university offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma course in arts, science and commerce field.

College_Name: IITM Janakpuri
College_Summary: Indraprastha Institute Technology & Management (IITM), New Delhi established in 2002. The institute offers various undergraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering, Computer Application, and Management. Admission to IITM Janakpuri is done on the basis of merit and entrance test scores.

College_Name: Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology
College_Summary: Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology, located in Delhi, was established by the Maharaja Agrasen Technical Education Society. It is affiliated with Guru Govind Singh Indraprastha University and is also an ISO 9001-2015 Certified Institute. MAIT offers full-time programs for undergraduate and postgraduate degrees and is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education. MAIT offers Bachelor's degrees in 13 engineering disciplines and a postgraduate degree in MBA. Admission to these courses is based on an Entrance exam. MAIT's B.Tech programs are semester-based, with each program divided into eight semesters. MAIT, Delhi also holds an excellent placement rate and maintains a record of placing 600+ students. In 2023, a total of 846 students were placed with the highest package of INR 51 LPA and the average package of INR 3-5 LPA.

College_Name: MSIT Delhi
College_Summary: Maharaja Surajmal Institute of Technology (MSIT) is an AICTE-approved private engineering institute under the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University The university is located in the Institutional area of Janakpuri, New Delhi. MSIT holds an ISO 9001:2015 Certification and has been accredited by the NAAC with an "A" grade. MSIT was established in 2001 and spans an eight-acre campus surrounded by ecologically friendly surroundings.

College_Name: South Asian University (SAU), Delhi
College_Summary: South Asian University (SAU), New Delhi was established in 2010. It is an international university established by the eight-member nations of South Asian Association for Regional Co-operation (SAARC) viz. Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka. The University has been affiliated by University Grants Commission (UGC) for its programs. It aims to provide liberal and humane education to the brightest and the most dedicated students of South Asia so that a new class of quality leadership is nurtured. The university offers post-graduate and doctoral programs in various disciplines. The University is currently functioning from Akbar Bhawan Campus in Chanakyapuri, New Delhi.

The Mahaveer Institute of Engineering and Technology, Meerut offers hundreds of courses in Engineering, management, Pharmaceutical Science, and commerce such as B.Tech/M. Tech, MBA, B.Com, etc.. Admission into Mahaveer Institute of Engineering and Technology, Meerut is offered on the scores Jee Mains and CUET-UG and CUET-PG. College_Name: IIIT Sonepat
College_Summary: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Sonepat, also known as IIIT Sonepat is considered to be one of the supreme institutes. This institute is amongst 20 new IIITs approved by MHRD and started to intake students from 2014. IIIT Sonepat has a lush green and friendly environment which leads to a student in living a healthy life. The campus has an amazing infrastructure.

College_Name: Pusa Institute of Technology
College_Summary: Pusa Institute of Technology was established in 1962 and is approved by the Board of Technical Education, Delhi as well as the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). The college offers Diploma courses in technical education with multiple specializations. Students that have qualified class 10th can apply for admission at the Pusa Institute of Technology. The selection of candidates is done on the basis of their performance in the Delhi Polytechnic Common Entrance Test. The interested candidates can apply for admission via the offline method.

College_Name: HLM Business School, Ghaziabad
College_Summary: HLM Business School runs under the HLM Group of Institutions which was established in 2005. This institute is affiliated to Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU), Lucknow and approved by AICTE. Its flagship course is Post Graduate Diploma in Management 9PGDM). Admission in this college is offered through the clearance in entrance exams like MAT, CAT, and UPSEE. Some of the placement partners of HLM Business School include Rasna, Hero Honda, Axis bank, ICICI Bank, and Wipro.

College_Name: Bhagwan Parshuram Institute of Technology
College_Summary: Bhagwan Parshuram Institute of Technology was established in 2007. BPIT, an 'A' grade institute of GGSIPU, offers Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) and Master of Business Administration (MBA) programs that are approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). Additionally, a three-year full-time Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) program is also offered. The campus spans about 6 acres, and the institute provides an infrastructure with modern facilities like multimedia-equipped lecture halls, well-furnished seminar halls, well-equipped laboratories, a large conference room, and an organized girls' hostel.

College_Name: IMS Engineering College
College_Summary: IMS Engineering College or IMSEC is a leading higher education college in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh. The college is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE), accredited with Grade A by NAAC, and is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. IMS Engineering College was founded in 2002 and offers 17 different courses in full-time mode.

College_Name: ADGITM (formerly NIEC)
College_Summary: Dr. Akhilesh Das Gupta Institute of Technology & Management, formerly known as Northern India Engineering College (NIEC), New Delhi, was established by BBDES, Lucknow in 2003. The ADGITM campus is located in Shastri Park, a lush 8.08-acre area, and is made up of five interconnected blocks with a total built-up area of roughly 23,636.67 square meters. Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU), located in Delhi, is affiliated with ADGITM, which offers full-time professional programs at the undergraduate and graduate levels that have been approved by AICTE and BCI. Admission to these courses is done through entrance exams such as IPU-CET, JEE-MAINS, CAT/ MAT/ XAT. The application mode for admission is online.

College_Name: CodeQuotient School of Technology, Panipat, Haryana
College_Summary: CodeQuotient School of Technology in Panipat is a new-age software engineering school that specializes in practical software engineering with real-work experience to the students. The flagship program of this school is Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) combined with UG Program in Software Engineering, surpasing a traditional BCA degree. This curriculum provides students with up to 1.5 years of work experience through internships and project work, in addition to a degree.

College_Name: Indian Institute of Printing and Packaging Technology, Greater Noida
College_Summary: Indian Institute of Printing and Packaging Technology is an Uttar Pradesh based reputed private college which was founded in 1995 under the aegis of Indian Institute of Printing and Packaging Society and offers cost-effective and employment oriented Undergraduate courses across various specializations like Commerce, Computer Applications and Business Administration etc.

College_Name: Academy of Pastry and Culinary Arts, Gurgaon
College_Summary: Academy of Pastry and Culinary Arts is a Gurgaon based esteemed private institution which was founded in 2015 and offers a wide variety of Undergraduate, Advanced Diploma and Certification courses across various disciplines like Tourism Studies, Culinary Arts and Pastry and Bakery etc. The Academy is approved by City & Guilds UK and Tourism and Hospitality Skill Council. Admission to the institute’s programs is granted to aspiring students depending on their last year qualifying exam and candidates should also possess a basic knowledge of English language.

IIM Sambalpur Delhi Campus
College_Summary: IIM Sambalpur is one of the Baby IIMs in the country. IIM Sambalpur has set up its Campus at Vasant Kunj, New Delhi. IIM Sambalpur Delhi Campus offers a 2-Year, MBA Program in blended mode, designed for Working Professionals. Candidates with a Bachelor’s Degree are eligible to apply for the Program. IIM Sambalpur Delhi Campus MBA fees is INR 14 Lakhs.

College_Name: Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism, Gurgaon, Haryana
College_Summary: Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism is a prestigious Private institute in Gurgaon and was founded in 2008 to produce outstanding and globally relevant professionals for the Media, Management, and Technology industry. The college is affiliated with The Northcap University of Gurgaon and has received an ‘A’ grade from NAAC. Seamedu offers a wide range of Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma, and Certificate programs across disciplines such as Science, Arts, Journalism, Film Making, Game Development, Computer Applications, Business Administration etc. Master Classes on Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality are also conducted, wherein students are taught how to build simple applications for mobile devices.

College_Name: Indian Institute of Gems & Jewellery - [IIGJ], New Delhi
RMS Business School, Gurgaon, Haryana
College_Summary: RMS Business School is a Gurgaon-based college that came into existence in 2007 under the aegis of Rao Neki Ram Memorial Colleges. It offers MBA and PG Diploma programs across disciplines such as Human Resource Management, Financial Management, Supply Chain Management, Marketing Management, Healthcare and Hospitality Management, Aviation Management, etc. The college is approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD - Government of India, affiliated to Gurugram University and accredited by the NBA, NAAC with an A++ grade, and American professional and accreditation organization Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business, also known as AACSB. Admission to RMS courses is granted to aspiring students based on their merit and overall academic records in the previous year’s qualifying exam, and scores of entrance tests such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ CMAT/ GMAT/ ATMA. Group discussions and personal interviews are also conducted by the Admission Committee to shortlist applicants.
